bus_ssram.v

00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief IS61LPS51236A pipelined SSRAM driver with WISHBONE slave interface.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief bus_ssram.v
00030 */
00031 module bus_ssram(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input               clk_30,
00035     input               reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00039     //% @{
00040     input [20:2]        ADR_I,
00041     input               CYC_I,
00042     input               WE_I,
00043     input [3:0]         SEL_I,
00044     input               STB_I,
00045     input [31:0]        DAT_I,
00046     output reg [31:0]   DAT_O,
00047     output reg          ACK_O,
00048     //% @}
00049 
00050     //% \name Direct drv_ssram read/write burst DMA for ocs_video and drv_vga 

00051     //% @{
00052     // drv_vga read burst
00053     input               burst_read_vga_request,
00054     input [31:2]        burst_read_vga_address,
00055     output              burst_read_vga_ready,
00056     // ocs_video bitplain read burst
00057     input               burst_read_video_request,
00058     input [31:2]        burst_read_video_address,
00059     output              burst_read_video_ready,
00060     // common read burst data signal
00061     output reg [35:0]   burst_read_data,
00062     //% @}
00063     
00064     // ocs_video video output write burst
00065     input               burst_write_request,
00066     input [31:2]        burst_write_address,
00067     output reg          burst_write_ready,
00068     input [35:0]        burst_write_data,
00069     //% @}
00070     
00071     //% \name IS61LPS51236A pipelined SSRAM hardware interface

00072     //% @{
00073     output reg [18:0]   ssram_address,
00074     output reg          ssram_oe_n,
00075     output reg          ssram_writeen_n,
00076     output reg [3:0]    ssram_byteen_n,
00077     output              ssram_adsp_n,
00078     output              ssram_clk,
00079     output              ssram_globalw_n,
00080     output reg          ssram_advance_n,
00081     output reg          ssram_adsc_n,
00082     output              ssram_ce1_n,
00083     output              ssram_ce2,
00084     output              ssram_ce3_n,
00085     inout [35:0]        ssram_data
00086     //% @}
00087 );
00088 
00089 assign ssram_clk = clk_30;
00090 assign ssram_globalw_n = 1'b1;
00091 assign ssram_adsp_n = 1'b1;
00092 assign ssram_ce1_n = 1'b0;
00093 assign ssram_ce2 = 1'b1;
00094 assign ssram_ce3_n = 1'b0;
00095 
00096 reg ssram_data_oe;
00097 reg [35:0] ssram_data_reg;
00098 assign ssram_data = (ssram_data_oe == 1'b1) ? ssram_data_reg : 36'bZ;
00099 
00100 reg [18:0] burst_address;
00101 
00102 reg burst_read_select;
00103 reg burst_read_ready;
00104 
00105 assign burst_read_vga_ready = (burst_read_select == 1'b0)? burst_read_ready : 1'b0;
00106 assign burst_read_video_ready = (burst_read_select == 1'b0)? 1'b0 : burst_read_ready;
00107 
00108 reg [3:2] burst_read_low_address;
00109 reg burst_read_one_loop;
00110 wire burst_read_request;
00111 assign burst_read_request = (burst_read_select == 1'b0)? burst_read_vga_request : burst_read_video_request;
00112 
00113 reg [3:0] state;
00114 parameter [3:0]
00115     S_IDLE      = 4'd0,
00116     S_VW0       = 4'd1,
00117     S_VW1       = 4'd2,
00118     S_VW2       = 4'd3,
00119     S_VW3       = 4'd4,
00120     S_VW4       = 4'd5,
00121     S_VR1       = 4'd6,
00122     S_VR2       = 4'd7,
00123     S_VR3       = 4'd8,
00124     S_VR4       = 4'd9,
00125     S_R1        = 4'd10,
00126     S_R2        = 4'd11,
00127     S_R3        = 4'd12,
00128     S_PRE_IDLE  = 4'd13;
00129 
00130 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00131     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00132         ssram_address <= 19'd0;
00133         ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00134         ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00135         ssram_data_reg <= 36'd0;
00136         ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00137         ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00138         ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00139         ssram_byteen_n <= 4'b1111;
00140         
00141         burst_address <= 19'd0;
00142         
00143         burst_read_data <= 36'd0;
00144         burst_read_ready <= 1'b0;
00145         burst_read_select <= 1'b0;
00146         burst_read_low_address <= 2'd0;
00147         burst_read_one_loop <= 1'b0;
00148         
00149         burst_write_ready <= 1'b0;
00150         
00151         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00152         DAT_O <= 32'd0;
00153         
00154         state <= S_IDLE;
00155     end
00156     else if(state == S_IDLE) begin
00157         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00158         
00159         if(burst_read_vga_request == 1'b1 || burst_read_video_request == 1'b1) begin
00160             // address and byte enables output
00161             if(burst_read_vga_request == 1'b1)          ssram_address <= { burst_read_vga_address[20:4], 2'b0 };
00162             else if(burst_read_video_request == 1'b1)   ssram_address <= { burst_read_video_address[20:4], 2'b0 };
00163             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b0;
00164             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00165             ssram_data_reg <= 32'd0;
00166             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00167             ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00168             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00169             ssram_byteen_n <= 4'b0000;
00170             
00171             if(burst_read_vga_request == 1'b1) begin
00172                 burst_address <= { burst_read_vga_address[20:4], 2'b0 } + 19'd4;
00173                 burst_read_low_address <= burst_read_vga_address[3:2];
00174                 burst_read_select <= 1'b0;
00175             end
00176             else if(burst_read_video_request == 1'b1) begin
00177                 burst_address <= { burst_read_video_address[20:4], 2'b0 } + 19'd4;
00178                 burst_read_low_address <= burst_read_video_address[3:2];
00179                 burst_read_select <= 1'b1;
00180             end
00181             burst_read_one_loop <= 1'b0;
00182             state <= S_VR1;
00183         end
00184         else if(burst_write_request == 1'b1) begin
00185             burst_write_ready <= 1'b1;
00186             burst_address <= burst_write_address[20:2];
00187             state <= S_VW0;
00188         end
00189         else if(ACK_O == 1'b0 && CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0) begin
00190             // address and byte enables output
00191             ssram_address <= ADR_I[20:2];
00192             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b0;
00193             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00194             ssram_data_reg <= 32'd0;
00195             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00196             ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00197             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00198             ssram_byteen_n <= 4'b0000;
00199         
00200             state <= S_R1;
00201         end
00202         else if(ACK_O == 1'b0 && CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1) begin
00203             // address, byte enables and write enables output
00204             ssram_address <= ADR_I[20:2];
00205             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b0;
00206             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00207             ssram_data_reg <= { 4'b0, DAT_I };
00208             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00209             ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00210             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b0;
00211             ssram_byteen_n <= ~SEL_I;
00212             
00213             ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00214             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00215         end
00216     end
00217     else if(state == S_VW0) begin
00218         state <= S_VW1;
00219     end
00220     else if(state == S_VW1) begin
00221         if(burst_write_request == 1'b0) begin
00222             burst_write_ready <= 1'b0;
00223             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00224             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00225             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00226             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00227             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00228         end
00229         else begin
00230             // address, byte enables and write enables output
00231             ssram_address <= burst_address;
00232             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b0;
00233             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00234             ssram_data_reg <= burst_write_data;
00235             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b1;
00236             ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00237             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b0;
00238             ssram_byteen_n <= 4'b0000;
00239         
00240             burst_address <= burst_address + 19'd4;
00241             state <= S_VW2;
00242         end
00243     end
00244     else if(state == S_VW2) begin
00245         if(burst_write_request == 1'b0) begin
00246             burst_write_ready <= 1'b0;
00247             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00248             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00249             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00250             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00251             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00252         end
00253         else begin
00254             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00255             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b0;
00256             ssram_data_reg <= burst_write_data;
00257         
00258             state <= S_VW3;
00259         end
00260     end
00261     else if(state == S_VW3) begin
00262         if(burst_write_request == 1'b0) begin
00263             burst_write_ready <= 1'b0;
00264             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00265             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00266             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00267             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00268             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00269         end
00270         else begin
00271             ssram_data_reg <= burst_write_data;
00272             
00273             state <= S_VW4;
00274         end
00275     end
00276     else if(state == S_VW4) begin
00277         if(burst_write_request == 1'b0) begin
00278             burst_write_ready <= 1'b0;
00279             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00280             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00281             ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00282             ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00283             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00284         end
00285         else begin
00286             ssram_data_reg <= burst_write_data;
00287         
00288             state <= S_VW1;
00289         end
00290     end
00291     else if(state == S_VR1) begin
00292         if(burst_read_request == 1'b0) begin
00293             burst_read_ready <= 1'b0;
00294             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00295             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00296             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00297         end
00298         else begin
00299             if(burst_read_low_address[3:2] == 2'b10 && burst_read_one_loop == 1'b1) burst_read_ready <= 1'b1;
00300             
00301             // address and byte enables latched
00302             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00303             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b0;
00304         
00305             burst_read_data <= ssram_data;
00306             state <= S_VR2;
00307         end
00308     end
00309     else if(state == S_VR2) begin
00310         if(burst_read_request == 1'b0) begin
00311             burst_read_ready <= 1'b0;
00312             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00313             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00314             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00315         end
00316         else begin
00317             if(burst_read_low_address[3:2] == 2'b11 && burst_read_one_loop == 1'b1) burst_read_ready <= 1'b1;
00318             
00319             // output enable output
00320             ssram_oe_n <= 1'b0;
00321         
00322             burst_read_data <= ssram_data;
00323             state <= S_VR3;
00324         end
00325     end
00326     else if(state == S_VR3) begin
00327         if(burst_read_request == 1'b0) begin
00328             burst_read_ready <= 1'b0;
00329             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00330             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00331             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00332         end
00333         else begin
00334             if(burst_read_low_address[3:2] == 2'b00) burst_read_ready <= 1'b1;
00335             
00336             burst_read_data <= ssram_data;
00337             state <= S_VR4;
00338         end
00339     end
00340     else if(state == S_VR4) begin
00341         if(burst_read_request == 1'b0) begin
00342             burst_read_ready <= 1'b0;
00343             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00344             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00345             state <= S_PRE_IDLE;
00346         end
00347         else begin
00348             if(burst_read_low_address[3:2] == 2'b01) burst_read_ready <= 1'b1;
00349             burst_read_one_loop <= 1'b1;
00350             
00351             ssram_address <= burst_address;
00352             ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b0;
00353             ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00354         
00355             burst_read_data <= ssram_data;
00356             burst_address <= burst_address + 19'd4;
00357             state <= S_VR1;
00358         end
00359     end
00360     else if(state == S_R1) begin
00361         // address and byte enables latched
00362         ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00363         ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00364         
00365         state <= S_R2;
00366     end
00367     else if(state == S_R2) begin
00368         // output enable output
00369         ssram_oe_n <= 1'b0;
00370         
00371         state <= S_R3;
00372     end
00373     else if(state == S_R3) begin
00374         DAT_O <= ssram_data[31:0];
00375         ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00376         
00377         ssram_address <= 19'd0;
00378         ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00379         ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00380         ssram_data_reg <= 36'd0;
00381         ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00382         ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00383         ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00384         ssram_byteen_n <= 4'b1111;
00385         
00386         state <= S_IDLE;
00387     end
00388     else if(state == S_PRE_IDLE) begin
00389         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00390         
00391         ssram_address <= 19'd0;
00392         ssram_adsc_n <= 1'b1;
00393         ssram_advance_n <= 1'b1;
00394         ssram_data_reg <= 36'd0;
00395         ssram_data_oe <= 1'b0;
00396         ssram_oe_n <= 1'b1;
00397         ssram_writeen_n <= 1'b1;
00398         ssram_byteen_n <= 4'b1111;
00399         
00400         state <= S_IDLE;
00401     end
00402 end
00403 
00404 endmodule
